title: 16 Blocks - Widescreen Edition(Alt. Ending) (MKV)
description:
PG-13 | 1h 42min | Action, Crime, Drama | March 3rd 2006



An aging alcoholic cop is assigned the task of escorting a witness from police custody to a courthouse 16 blocks away. There are, however, chaotic forces at work that prevent them from making it in one piece.



Director: Richard Donner

Writer: Richard Wenk

Stars: Bruce Willis, Yasiin Bey, David Morse


Feature has English & French audio with English, French and Spanish subtitles.
Feature with alternate ending has English audio with English, French and Spanish subtitles.
Alternate ending has English audio with French subtitles.
Deleted scenes is English audio.
Bonus material not rated.
Presented in a letterbox widescreen format.
NTSC-1
